title: Take shelter
initialText:
As you run through the crowd, you know you need to find shelter. You need to find shelter NOW.
As you push the peasants, the guards, all the townsfolk, the figure in the sky looks at the crowd; it searches for something... or someone.
As it delivers a powerful groan, the people scream and run even faster, leaving all behind.
As you reach the end of the road, you see the following:

decisions.result: Please, I don't want to be mugged or murdered in here.

decisions.text: A wagon full oh hay (yay hay again)
